meaning: a tall plant that has a trunk and branches with leaves
example_en: The bird built its nest in the old oak tree.

meaning: a person you know well and like who is not part of your family
example_en: She called her best friend to share the good news.
example_gloss: 그녀는 좋은 소식을 나누기 위해 가장 친한 친구에게 전화했다.

meaning: a person who helps others without being paid; to offer to do something
example_en: Many volunteers helped clean up the park after the festival.
example_gloss: 많은 자원봉사자들이 축제 후 공원 청소를 도왔다.

meaning: wanting to know or learn about something
example_en: The curious child asked many questions about how planes fly.
example_gloss: 호기심 많은 아이가 비행기가 어떻게 나는지에 대해 많은 질문을 했다.

meaning: to make something better than before
example_en: Regular exercise will improve your health and energy levels.
example_gloss: 규칙적인 운동은 당신의 건강과 에너지 수준을 향상시킬 것이다.

meaning: a custom or belief that has existed for a long time
example_en: It's a family tradition to have dinner together every Sunday.
example_gloss: 매주 일요일에 함께 저녁을 먹는 것은 가족의 전통이다.

meaning: admiration for someone; to show consideration for others
example_en: Students should show respect for their teachers and classmates.
example_gloss: 학생들은 선생님과 급우들에게 존경을 표해야 한다.

meaning: willing to give more money, help, etc. than usual
example_en: She was generous with her time and helped everyone who asked.
example_gloss: 그녀는 시간을 아낌없이 내어 도움을 요청하는 모든 사람을 도왔다.

meaning: to examine something carefully to understand it
example_en: Scientists analyze data to find patterns and draw conclusions.
example_gloss: 과학자들은 패턴을 찾고 결론을 도출하기 위해 데이터를 분석한다.

meaning: money put into something to make a profit; time or effort spent
example_en: Education is the best investment you can make in your future.
example_gloss: 교육은 당신의 미래에 할 수 있는 최고의 투자이다.

meaning: having doubts about something; not easily convinced
example_en: She remained skeptical about the new diet's effectiveness.
example_gloss: 그녀는 새로운 다이어트의 효과에 대해 여전히 회의적이었다.

meaning: able to express ideas clearly and persuasively in speech or writing
example_en: The politician gave an eloquent speech that moved the audience.
example_gloss: 그 정치인은 청중을 감동시키는 웅변적인 연설을 했다.

meaning: a very slight difference in meaning, feeling, or response
example_en: The translator captured every nuance of the original poem.

meaning: to cause something to continue indefinitely
example_en: Stereotypes perpetuate misunderstandings between different cultures.
example_gloss: 고정관념은 서로 다른 문화 간의 오해를 지속시킨다.

meaning: appearing to be everywhere at the same time; widespread
example_en: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.
example_gloss: 스마트폰은 현대 사회에서 어디에나 있게 되었다.
